name: AD LEFT RIGHT
description:
This game was made for GMTK Jam 2021. The theme was "Joined Together".
The goal of game is simple. You have to survive as many levels as you can. Write down your best score!

The gimmick of the game is when you move horizontally one of the block. The other move vertically. You have to avoid red blobs. You cannot move if you have dark block on your way.

Controls

A - Move Left Yellow Block and Move Up Blue Block

D - Move Right Yellow Block and Move Down Blue Block

Left Arrow - Move Left Blue Block and Move Up Yellow Block

D - Move Right Blue Block and Move Down Yellow Block
